mapper.select: WITH my_turn_lines AS ( SELECT L.* FROM atrz_line L WHERE L.sanctner_empno = #{emplNo} AND L.sanctn_progrs_sttus_code = '00' AND L.atrz_ty = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM atrz_line L2 WHERE L2.atrz_doc_no = L.atrz_doc_no AND L2.atrz_ln_sn < L.atrz_ln_sn AND L2.atrz_ty = 'N' AND L2.sanctn_progrs_sttus_code NOT IN ('10', '60') ) ) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atrz A JOIN my_turn_lines L ON A.atrz_doc_no = L.atrz_doc_no WHERE A.atrz_compt_dt IS NULL AND A.atrz_sttus_code IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.atrz_drft_dt DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atrz WHERE drafter_empno = #{emplNo} AND atrz_sttus_code = '00' AND atrz_delete_yn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atrz WHERE drafter_empno = #{emplNo} AND atrz_sttus_code = '20' AND atrz_delete_yn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atrz WHERE drafter_empno = #{emplNo} AND atrz_sttus_code = '10' AND atrz_delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT B.BBS_SN, B.BBS_CTGRY_NO, CT.Ctgry_NM AS BBS_CTGRY_NM, B.EMPL_NO, E.EMPL_NM, B.BBSCTT_SJ, B.BBSCTT_CN, B.BBSCTT_CREAT_DT, B.BBSCTT_UPDT_DT, B.RDCNT, B.BBSCTT_USE_YN, B.UPEND_FIXING_YN, B.ATCH_FILE_NO,
-- 첨부파일 수 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ATTATCH_FILE F WHERE B.ATCH_FILE_NO = F.ATCH_FILE_NO) AS ATCH_CNT,
-- 댓글 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BBS_ANSWER A WHERE A.BBS_SN = B.BBS_SN AND A.BBS_CTGRY_NO = B.BBS_CTGRY_NO) AS COMMENT_CNT,
-- 좋아요 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BBS_LIKE L WHERE L.BBS_SN = B.BBS_SN AND L.BBS_CTGRY_NO = B.BBS_CTGRY_NO) AS LIKE_CNT
FROM BBS B JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON B.EMPL_NO = E.EMPL_NO JOIN BBS_CTGRY CT ON B.BBS_CTGRY_NO = CT.BBS_CTGRY_NO WHERE B.BBSCTT_USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.BBS_CTGRY_NO = #{bbsCtgryNo} ORDER BY DECODE(B.UPEND_FIXING_YN, 'Y', 0, 1), B.BBSCTT_CREAT_DT DESC OFFSET (#{currentPage} - 1) * 3 ROWS FETCH NEXT 3 ROWS ONLY

SELECT ATCH_FILE_NO, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_PATH, FILE_NM, FILE_STRE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_MIME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_VIEW_SIZE, DWLD_CO, EMPL_NO, FILE_USE_YN, FILE_CREAT_DT FROM ATTATCH_FILE WHERE ATCH_FILE_NO = #{atchFileNo} AND FILE_USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BBS B JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON B.EMPL_NO = E.EMPL_NO JOIN BBS_CTGRY CT ON B.BBS_CTGRY_NO = CT.BBS_CTGRY_NO WHERE B.BBSCTT_USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.BBS_CTGRY_NO = '1'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE WHERE (SCHDUL_TY = '1' AND SCHDUL_TY = '0' OR DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND EMPL_NO = #{emplNo}) AND TO_CHAR(SCHDUL_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-mm-DD')= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-mm-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SCHDUL_END_DT, 'YYYY-mm-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-mm-DD')
